name: Tenebrous Expanse (Charity Release)
description:
A project initially developed for Ludum Dare 33. You play a seething ball of darkness, and your only goal is to spread the eternal blackness as far as you can. However, you only have a few tries to do this – your life is limited, and you must plan your shots well to fully accomplish your mission.

This version is solely a charity release, all proceeds go towards the US STEM Foundation to help spread STEM education throughout the country and bring up the next generation of game designers and programmers.

* We will be adding a bonus 10-20 level pack to this version in the near future, so keep an eye out for updates!
